channel.title: Poetry on Simo Ahava's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Poetry on Simo Ahava's blog

item.title: An Optimized Haiku
item.description: Dear client, search engine Optimization for you? Or perhaps - donuts? The Web, I'm afraid, Is a pretty sticky maze. And you're the trapped fly. We tell you we'll help, But you will not believe us. You are very wise. Everything we do, Everything we claim we do, You can do yourself. But if you let us Approach you humbly, gently, As a team, we'll rock. We'll rock Google, check!
